product_name: Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With specialized technical fabric, the men's Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat actively cools your head for long-lasting comfort while traveling and hiking in warm weather. Breathable stretch nylon offers lightweight durability and a comfortable fit. Cool.Q(TM) ZERO mesh side panels have sweat-activated cooling polymers embedded in the fabric that help lower the fabric's temperature. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. 4-in. brim of the Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat folds up and packs down for easy carrying. Drawcord under chin allows for a secure, customized fit. Closeout.
